block.p: ZOLDESSY-Ann. Beloved wife of the late William. Devoted mother of Dr. Martin (Aurian), Barbara, Joan Zoldessy Kaufmann (Dr. Charles), and Julie. Cherished grandmother of Kim, Jesse, Shayne, Kelly, Kimberly, Sasha, Amelia and Samuel. Great-grandmother of William. Dear sister of Mary Maimone. Services today 12 noon ''Sinai Chapels'', 162-05 Horace Harding Expressway, Fresh Meadows, NY.
